item.title: Remains of man missing for 31 years found by climbers on glacier
item.description: Officers reached the site by helicopter to collect the remains and personal effects from the Ober Gabelhorn glacier.

item.title: President Trump floats sending Americans $2,000 tariff rebate checks
item.description: President Trump on Sunday floated the idea of tapping his administration's tariff revenue to send checks to most Americans.

item.title: Novo Nordisk slashes out-of-pocket prices for Wegovy and Ozempic
item.description: The Danish drugmaker said it's cutting the price of Wegovy and Ozempic from $499 to $349 per month for some customers who buy the drugs directly.
